scripts.build: ncc build src/index.ts -o dist --license licenses.txt && cp $(find ../../node_modules -name tiktoken_bg.wasm | grep -v lite | head -n 1) dist/ && sed -i 's/loadLanguage_require("url")/require("url")/g' dist/index.js && find dist -name "*.js" -exec sed -i "s/runtime: 'worker_threads'/runtime: 'child_process'/g" {} + && mkdir -p dist/tinypool-dist && cp -r $(find ../../node_modules -type d -path "*/tinypool/dist" | grep "tinypool@2.0.0" | head -n 1)/* dist/tinypool-dist/ && find dist -name "*.js" -exec sed -i "s/__nccwpck_require__.ab + \"process.js\"/require('url').pathToFileURL(require('path').join(__dirname, 'tinypool-dist', 'entry', 'process.js')).href/g" {} +
